announcements.title: Welcome
announcements.message: Welcome to Lanuncher! Explore amazing applications and features.

announcements.title: New Update Available
announcements.message: Version 2.1.0 is now available with improved performance and bug fixes.

announcements.title: Scheduled Maintenance
announcements.message: Server maintenance will begin at 2:00 AM UTC on January 8th.

announcements.title: New Feature
announcements.message: Dark mode theme support has been added to enhance your experience.

announcements.title: Important Notice
announcements.message: Please backup your data before updating to the latest version.

announcements.title: Security Update
announcements.message: Critical security patches have been applied. Please restart the application.

announcements.title: Migration Complete
announcements.message: Database migration has been successfully completed with zero downtime.

announcements.title: Service Disruption
announcements.message: Some services may be temporarily unavailable due to network issues.

announcements.title: Community Event
announcements.message: Join our Discord server for the upcoming community gaming tournament!

announcements.title: System Status
announcements.message: All systems are operational and running smoothly. Thank you for using AuraLauncher.
